original_title: Nardong Putik (Kilabot ng Cavite) Version II
overview: The untold true to life story of Leonardo M. Manecio of Malagasang, Imus, Cavite, who possesses an amulet which renders him invisible whenever he is in the mud, as well as the modern day Robin Hood of Cavite
title: Nardong Putik (Kilabot ng Cavite) Version II
